verses.verse: וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <S%H3478><s%> So all Israel הִתְיַחְשׂ֔וּ <S%H3187><s%> were reckoned by genealogies וְהִנָּ֣ם <S%H2009><s%> and behold כְּתוּבִ֔ים <S%H3789><s%> and behold they [were] written עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> in סֵ֖פֶר <S%H5612><s%> in the book מַלְכֵ֣י <S%H4428><s%> of the kings יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel וִיהוּדָ֛ה <S%H3063><s%> and Judah הָגְל֥וּ <S%H1540><s%> [who] were carried away לְבָבֶ֖ל <S%H894><s%> to Babylon בְּמַעֲלָֽם׃ <S%H4604><s%> for their transgression ס

וְהַיּוֹשְׁבִים֙ <S%H3427><s%> inhabitants הָרִ֣אשֹׁנִ֔ים <S%H7223><s%> Now the first אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> who בַּאֲחֻזָּתָ֖ם <S%H272><s%> that [dwelt] in their possessions בְּעָרֵיהֶ֑ם <S%H5892><s%> in their cities יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <S%H3478><s%> [were] the Israelites הַכֹּ֣הֲנִ֔ים <S%H3548><s%> the priests הַלְוִיִּ֖ם <S%H3881><s%> Levites וְהַנְּתִינִֽים׃ <S%H5411><s%> and the Nethinims

וּבִירוּשָׁלִַ֙ם֙ <S%H3389><s%> And in Jerusalem יָשְׁב֔וּ <S%H3427><s%> dwelt מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> Some בְּנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> of the children יְהוּדָ֖ה <S%H3063><s%> of Judah וּמִן־ <S%H4480><s%> Some בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> and of the children בִנְיָמִ֑ן <S%H1144><s%> of Benjamin וּמִן־ <S%H4480><s%> Some בְּנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> and of the children אֶפְרַ֖יִם <S%H669><s%> of Ephraim וּמְנַשֶּֽׁה׃ <S%H4519><s%> and Manasseh

עוּתַ֨י <S%H5793><s%> Uthai בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son עַמִּיה֤וּד <S%H5989><s%> of Ammihud בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son עָמְרִי֙ <S%H6018><s%> of Omri בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son אִמְרִ֣י <S%H566><s%> of Imri בֶן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son [בָּנִימִן־ כ] (בָּנִ֔י ק) (מִן־ <S%H1144><s%> Benjamin בְּנֵי־ <S%H1137><s%> of Bani פֶ֖רֶץ <S%H6557><s%> of Pharez ק) בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> of the children יְהוּדָֽה׃ <S%H3063><s%> of Judah
וּמִן־ <S%H4480><s%> From הַשִּׁ֣ילוֹנִ֔י <S%H7888><s%> And of the Shilonites עֲשָׂיָ֥ה <S%H6222><s%> Asaiah הַבְּכ֖וֹר <S%H1060><s%> the firstborn וּבָנָֽיו׃ <S%H1121><s%> and his sons

וּמִן־ <S%H4480><s%> and of בְּנֵי־ <S%H1121><s%> And of the sons זֶ֖רַח <S%H2226><s%> of Zerah יְעוּאֵ֑ל <S%H3262><s%> Jeuel וַאֲחֵיהֶ֖ם <S%H251><s%> and their brethren שֵׁשׁ־ <S%H8337><s%> six מֵא֥וֹת <S%H3967><s%> hundred וְתִשְׁעִֽים׃ <S%H8673><s%> and ninety

וּמִן־ <S%H4480><s%> From בְּנֵ֖י <S%H1121><s%> And of the sons בִּנְיָמִ֑ן <S%H1144><s%> of Benjamin סַלּוּא֙ <S%H5543><s%> Sallu בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son מְשֻׁלָּ֔ם <S%H4918><s%> of Meshullam בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son הוֹדַוְיָ֖ה <S%H1938><s%> of Hodaviah בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son הַסְּנֻאָֽה׃ <S%H5574><s%> of Hasenuah

וְיִבְנְיָה֙ <S%H2997><s%> And Ibneiah בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son יְרֹחָ֔ם <S%H3395><s%> of Jeroham וְאֵלָ֥ה <S%H425><s%> and Elah בֶן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son עֻזִּ֖י <S%H5813><s%> of Uzzi בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son מִכְרִ֑י <S%H4381><s%> of Michri וּמְשֻׁלָּם֙ <S%H4918><s%> and Meshullam בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son שְׁפַטְיָ֔ה <S%H8203><s%> of Shephathiah בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son רְעוּאֵ֖ל <S%H7467><s%> of Reuel בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son יִבְנִיָּֽה׃ <S%H2998><s%> of Ibnijah

וַאֲחֵיהֶם֙ <S%H251><s%> And their brethren לְתֹ֣לְדוֹתָ֔ם <S%H8435><s%> according to their generations תְּשַׁ֥ע <S%H8672><s%> nine מֵא֖וֹת <S%H3967><s%> hundred וַחֲמִשִּׁ֣ים <S%H2572><s%> and fifty וְשִׁשָּׁ֑ה <S%H8337><s%> and six כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> All אֵ֣לֶּה <S%H428><s%> these אֲנָשִׁ֔ים <S%H376><s%> he רָאשֵׁ֥י <S%H7218><s%> [were] chief אָב֖וֹת <S%H1><s%> of the fathers לְבֵ֥ית <S%H1004><s%> in the house אֲבֹתֵיהֶֽם׃ <S%H1><s%> of their fathers ס
וּמִן־ <S%H4480><s%> From הַֽכֹּהֲנִ֑ים <S%H3548><s%> And of the priests יְדַֽעְיָ֥ה <S%H3048><s%> Jedaiah וִיהוֹיָרִ֖יב <S%H3080><s%> and Jehoiarib וְיָכִֽין׃ <S%H3199><s%> and Jachin

וַעֲזַרְיָ֨ה <S%H5838><s%> And Azariah בֶן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son חִלְקִיָּ֜ה <S%H2518><s%> of Hilkiah בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son מְשֻׁלָּ֣ם <S%H4918><s%> of Meshullam בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son צָד֗וֹק <S%H6659><s%> of Zadok בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son מְרָיוֹת֙ <S%H4812><s%> of Meraioth בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son אֲחִיט֔וּב <S%H285><s%> of Ahitub נְגִ֖יד <S%H5057><s%> the ruler בֵּ֥ית <S%H1004><s%> of the house הָאֱלֹהִֽים׃ <S%H430><s%> of God ס

וַעֲדָיָה֙ <S%H5718><s%> And Adaiah בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son יְרֹחָ֔ם <S%H3395><s%> of Jeroham בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son פַּשְׁח֖וּר <S%H6583><s%> of Pashur בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son מַלְכִּיָּ֑ה <S%H4441><s%> of Malchijah וּמַעְשַׂ֨י <S%H4640><s%> and Maasiai בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son עֲדִיאֵ֧ל <S%H5717><s%> of Adiel בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son יַחְזֵ֛רָה <S%H3170><s%> of Jahzerah בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son מְשֻׁלָּ֥ם <S%H4918><s%> of Meshullam בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son מְשִׁלֵּמִ֖ית <S%H4921><s%> of Meshillemith בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son אִמֵּֽר׃ <S%H564><s%> of Immer

וַאֲחֵיהֶ֗ם <S%H251><s%> And their brethren רָאשִׁים֙ <S%H7218><s%> heads לְבֵ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> of the house אֲבוֹתָ֔ם <S%H1><s%> of their fathers אֶ֕לֶף <S%H505><s%> a thousand וּשְׁבַ֥ע <S%H7651><s%> and seven מֵא֖וֹת <S%H3967><s%> hundred וְשִׁשִּׁ֑ים <S%H8346><s%> and threescore גִּבּ֣וֹרֵי <S%H1368><s%> men חֵ֔יל <S%H2428><s%> very able מְלֶ֖אכֶת <S%H4399><s%> for the work עֲבוֹדַ֥ת <S%H5656><s%> of the service בֵּית־ <S%H1004><s%> of the house הָאֱלֹהִֽים׃ <S%H430><s%> of God

וּמִֽן־ <S%H4480><s%> at הַלְוִיִּ֑ם <S%H3881><s%> And of the Levites שְׁמַֽעְיָ֧ה <S%H8098><s%> Shemaiah בֶן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son חַשּׁ֛וּב <S%H2815><s%> of Hasshub בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son עַזְרִיקָ֥ם <S%H5840><s%> of Azrikam בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son חֲשַׁבְיָ֖ה <S%H2811><s%> of Hashabiah מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> at בְּנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> of the sons מְרָרִֽי׃ <S%H4847><s%> of Merari

וּבַקְבַּקַּ֥ר <S%H1230><s%> And Bakbakkar חֶ֖רֶשׁ <S%H2792><s%> Heresh וְגָלָ֑ל <S%H1559><s%> and Galal וּמַתַּנְיָה֙ <S%H4983><s%> and Mattaniah בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son מִיכָ֔א <S%H4316><s%> of Micah בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son זִכְרִ֖י <S%H2147><s%> of Zichri בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son אָסָֽף׃ <S%H623><s%> of Asaph

וְעֹבַדְיָה֙ <S%H5662><s%> And Obadiah בֶּֽן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son שְׁמַֽעְיָ֔ה <S%H8098><s%> of Shemaiah בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son גָּלָ֖ל <S%H1559><s%> of Galal בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son יְדוּת֑וּן <S%H3038><s%> of Jeduthun וּבֶרֶכְיָ֤ה <S%H1296><s%> and Berechiah בֶן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son אָסָא֙ <S%H609><s%> of Asa בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son אֶלְקָנָ֔ה <S%H511><s%> of Elkanah הַיּוֹשֵׁ֖ב <S%H3427><s%> that dwelt בְּחַצְרֵ֥י <S%H2691><s%> in the villages נְטוֹפָתִֽי׃ <S%H5200><s%> of the Netophathites

וְהַשֹּׁעֲרִים֙ <S%H7778><s%> And the porters שַׁלּ֣וּם <S%H7967><s%> [were] Shallum וְעַקּ֔וּב <S%H6126><s%> and Akkub וְטַלְמֹ֖ן <S%H2929><s%> and Talmon וַאֲחִימָ֑ן <S%H289><s%> and Ahiman וַאֲחִיהֶ֥ם <S%H251><s%> and their brethren שַׁלּ֖וּם <S%H7967><s%> Shallum הָרֹֽאשׁ׃ <S%H7218><s%> [was] the chief

וְֽעַד־ <S%H5704><s%> until הֵ֔נָּה <S%H2008><s%> now בְּשַׁ֥עַר <S%H8179><s%> gate הַמֶּ֖לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> Who hitherto [waited] in the king's מִזְרָ֑חָה <S%H4217><s%> eastward הֵ֚מָּה <S%H1992><s%> like הַשֹּׁ֣עֲרִ֔ים <S%H7778><s%> they [were] porters לְמַחֲנ֖וֹת <S%H4264><s%> in the companies בְּנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> of the children לֵוִֽי׃ <S%H3878><s%> of Levi

וְשַׁלּ֣וּם <S%H7967><s%> And Shallum בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son ק֠וֹרֵא <S%H6981><s%> of Kore בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son אֶבְיָסָ֨ף <S%H43><s%> of Ebiasaph בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son קֹ֜רַח <S%H7141><s%> of Korah וְֽאֶחָ֧יו <S%H251><s%> and his brethren לְבֵית־ <S%H1004><s%> of the house אָבִ֣יו <S%H1><s%> of his father הַקָּרְחִ֗ים <S%H7145><s%> the Korahites עַ֚ל <S%H5921><s%> over מְלֶ֣אכֶת <S%H4399><s%> [were] over the work הָעֲבוֹדָ֔ה <S%H5656><s%> of the service שֹׁמְרֵ֥י <S%H8104><s%> keepers הַסִּפִּ֖ים <S%H5592><s%> of the gates לָאֹ֑הֶל <S%H168><s%> of the tabernacle וַאֲבֹֽתֵיהֶם֙ <S%H1><s%> and their fathers עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> had been over מַחֲנֵ֣ה <S%H4264><s%> [being] over the host יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD שֹׁמְרֵ֖י <S%H8104><s%> [were] keepers הַמָּבֽוֹא׃ <S%H3996><s%> of the entry

וּפִֽינְחָ֣ס <S%H6372><s%> And Phinehas בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son אֶלְעָזָ֗ר <S%H499><s%> of Eleazar נָגִ֨יד <S%H5057><s%> was the ruler הָיָ֧ה <S%H1961><s%> become עֲלֵיהֶ֛ם <S%H5921><s%> over לְפָנִ֖ים <S%H6440><s%> over them in time past יְהוָ֥ה ׀ <S%H3068><s%> [and] the LORD עִמּֽוֹ׃ <S%H5973><s%> with

זְכַרְיָה֙ <S%H2148><s%> [And] Zechariah בֶּ֣ן <S%H1121><s%> the son מְשֶֽׁלֶמְיָ֔ה <S%H4920><s%> of Meshelemiah שֹׁעֵ֥ר <S%H7778><s%> [was] porter פֶּ֖תַח <S%H6607><s%> of the door לְאֹ֥הֶל <S%H168><s%> of the tabernacle מוֹעֵֽד׃ <S%H4150><s%> of the congregation

כֻּלָּ֤ם <S%H3605><s%> these הַבְּרוּרִים֙ <S%H1305><s%> All these [which were] chosen לְשֹׁעֲרִ֣ים <S%H7778><s%> to be porters בַּסִּפִּ֔ים <S%H5592><s%> in the gates מָאתַ֖יִם <S%H3967><s%> [were] two hundred וּשְׁנֵ֣ים <S%H8147><s%> both עָשָׂ֑ר <S%H6240><s%> ten הֵ֤מָּה <S%H1992><s%> whom בְחַצְרֵיהֶם֙ <S%H2691><s%> in their villages הִתְיַחְשָׂ֔ם <S%H3187><s%> These were reckoned by their genealogy הֵ֣מָּה <S%H1992><s%> whom יִסַּ֥ד <S%H3245><s%> did ordain דָּוִ֛יד <S%H1732><s%> David וּשְׁמוּאֵ֥ל <S%H8050><s%> and Samuel הָרֹאֶ֖ה <S%H7200><s%> the seer בֶּאֱמוּנָתָֽם׃ <S%H530><s%> in their set office

וְהֵ֨ם <S%H1992><s%> they וּבְנֵיהֶ֜ם <S%H1121><s%> So they and their children עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> had charge הַשְּׁעָרִ֧ים <S%H8179><s%> [had] the oversight of the gates לְבֵית־ <S%H1004><s%> of the house יְהוָ֛ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD לְבֵ֥ית־ <S%H1004><s%> [namely] the house הָאֹ֖הֶל <S%H168><s%> of the tabernacle לְמִשְׁמָרֽוֹת׃ <S%H4931><s%> by wards

לְאַרְבַּ֣ע <S%H702><s%> In four רוּח֔וֹת <S%H7307><s%> quarters יִהְי֖וּ <S%H1961><s%> become הַשֹּׁעֲרִ֑ים <S%H7778><s%> were the porters מִזְרָ֥ח <S%H4217><s%> toward the east יָ֖מָּה <S%H3220><s%> west צָפ֥וֹנָה <S%H6828><s%> north וָנֶֽגְבָּה׃ <S%H5045><s%> and south

וַאֲחֵיהֶ֨ם <S%H251><s%> And their brethren בְּחַצְרֵיהֶ֜ם <S%H2691><s%> [which were] in their villages לָב֨וֹא <S%H935><s%> [were] to come לְשִׁבְעַ֧ת <S%H7651><s%> after seven הַיָּמִ֛ים <S%H3117><s%> days מֵעֵ֥ת <S%H6256><s%> from time אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to עֵ֖ת <S%H6256><s%> to time עִם־ <S%H5973><s%> with אֵֽלֶּה׃ <S%H428><s%> another

כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> for בֶאֱמוּנָ֞ה <S%H530><s%> were in [their] set office הֵ֗מָּה <S%H1992><s%> who אַרְבַּ֙עַת֙ <S%H702><s%> the four גִּבֹּרֵ֣י <S%H1368><s%> chief הַשֹּׁעֲרִ֔ים <S%H7778><s%> porters הֵ֖ם <S%H1992><s%> who הַלְוִיִּ֑ם <S%H3881><s%> For these Levites וְהָיוּ֙ <S%H1961><s%> become עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and were over הַלְּשָׁכ֔וֹת <S%H3957><s%> and were over the chambers וְעַ֥ל <S%H5921><s%> and over הָאֹצְר֖וֹת <S%H214><s%> and treasuries בֵּ֥ית <S%H1004><s%> of the house הָאֱלֹהִֽים׃ <S%H430><s%> of God

וּסְבִיב֥וֹת <S%H5439><s%> round about בֵּית־ <S%H1004><s%> the house הָאֱלֹהִ֖ים <S%H430><s%> of God יָלִ֑ינוּ <S%H3885><s%> And they lodged כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> because עֲלֵיהֶ֣ם <S%H5921><s%> was committed מִשְׁמֶ֔רֶת <S%H4931><s%> because the charge וְהֵ֥ם <S%H1992><s%> and they in עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> charge הַמַּפְתֵּ֖חַ <S%H4669><s%> opening וְלַבֹּ֥קֶר <S%H1242><s%> thereof every morning לַבֹּֽקֶר׃ <S%H1242><s%> morning

וּמֵהֶ֖ם <S%H1992><s%> of them עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> And [certain] of them had the charge of כְּלֵ֣י <S%H3627><s%> vessels הָעֲבוֹדָ֑ה <S%H5656><s%> the ministering כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for בְמִסְפָּ֣ר <S%H4557><s%> counted יְבִיא֔וּם <S%H935><s%> that they should bring them in וּבְמִסְפָּ֖ר <S%H4557><s%> counted יוֹצִיאֽוּם׃ <S%H3318><s%> and out

וּמֵהֶ֗ם <S%H1992><s%> also מְמֻנִּים֙ <S%H4487><s%> [Some] of them also [were] appointed עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> over הַכֵּלִ֔ים <S%H3627><s%> to oversee the vessels וְעַ֖ל <S%H5921><s%> and over כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all כְּלֵ֣י <S%H3627><s%> and all the instruments הַקֹּ֑דֶשׁ <S%H6944><s%> of the sanctuary וְעַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and over הַסֹּ֙לֶת֙ <S%H5560><s%> and the fine flour וְהַיַּ֣יִן <S%H3196><s%> and the wine וְהַשֶּׁ֔מֶן <S%H8081><s%> and the oil וְהַלְּבוֹנָ֖ה <S%H3828><s%> and the frankincense וְהַבְּשָׂמִֽים׃ <S%H1314><s%> and the spices

וּמִן־ <S%H4480><s%> Some בְּנֵי֙ <S%H1121><s%> And [some] of the sons הַכֹּ֣הֲנִ֔ים <S%H3548><s%> of the priests רֹקְחֵ֥י <S%H7543><s%> made הַמִּרְקַ֖חַת <S%H4842><s%> the ointment לַבְּשָׂמִֽים׃ <S%H1314><s%> of the spices

וּמַתִּתְיָה֙ <S%H4993><s%> And Mattithiah מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> at הַלְוִיִּ֔ם <S%H3881><s%> [one] of the Levites ה֥וּא <S%H1931><s%> who הַבְּכ֖וֹר <S%H1060><s%> who [was] the firstborn לְשַׁלֻּ֣ם <S%H7967><s%> of Shallum הַקָּרְחִ֑י <S%H7145><s%> the Korahite בֶּאֱמוּנָ֕ה <S%H530><s%> had the set office עַ֖ל <S%H5921><s%> over מַעֲשֵׂ֥ה <S%H4639><s%> over the things that were made הַחֲבִתִּֽים׃ <S%H2281><s%> in the pans

וּמִן־ <S%H4480><s%> Some בְּנֵ֧י <S%H1121><s%> of the sons הַקְּהָתִ֛י <S%H6956><s%> of the Kohathites מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> Some אֲחֵיהֶ֖ם <S%H251><s%> And [other] of their brethren עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> over לֶ֣חֶם <S%H3899><s%> bread הַֽמַּעֲרָ֑כֶת <S%H4635><s%> row לְהָכִ֖ין <S%H3559><s%> to prepare שַׁבַּ֥ת <S%H7676><s%> [it] every sabbath שַׁבָּֽת׃ <S%H7676><s%> sabbath ס

וְאֵ֣לֶּה <S%H428><s%> now these הַ֠מְשֹׁרְרִים <S%H7891><s%> And these [are] the singers רָאשֵׁ֨י <S%H7218><s%> chief אָב֧וֹת <S%H1><s%> of the fathers לַלְוִיִּ֛ם <S%H3881><s%> of the Levites בַּלְּשָׁכֹ֖ת <S%H3957><s%> [who remaining] in the chambers [פְּטִירִים כ] (פְּטוּרִ֑ים <S%H6358><s%> open ק) כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for יוֹמָ֥ם <S%H3119><s%> day וָלַ֛יְלָה <S%H3915><s%> and night עֲלֵיהֶ֖ם <S%H5921><s%> were engaged בַּמְּלָאכָֽה׃ <S%H4399><s%> for they were employed in [that] work

אֵלֶּה֩ <S%H428><s%> These רָאשֵׁ֨י <S%H7218><s%> These chief הָאָב֧וֹת <S%H1><s%> fathers לַלְוִיִּ֛ם <S%H3881><s%> of the Levites לְתֹלְדוֹתָ֖ם <S%H8435><s%> throughout their generations רָאשִׁ֑ים <S%H7218><s%> [were] chief אֵ֖לֶּה <S%H428><s%> who יָשְׁב֥וּ <S%H3427><s%> these dwelt בִירוּשָׁלִָֽם׃ <S%H3389><s%> at Jerusalem פ

וּבְגִבְע֛וֹן <S%H1391><s%> And in Gibeon יָשְׁב֥וּ <S%H3427><s%> dwelt אֲבִֽי־ <S%H1><s%> the father גִבְע֖וֹן <S%H1391><s%> of Gibeon [יְעוּאֵל כ] (יְעִיאֵ֑ל <S%H3273><s%> Jeiel ק) וְשֵׁ֥ם <S%H8034><s%> name אִשְׁתּ֖וֹ <S%H802><s%> whose wife's מַעֲכָֽה׃ <S%H4601><s%> [was] Maachah

וּבְנ֥וֹ <S%H1121><s%> son הַבְּכ֖וֹר <S%H1060><s%> And his firstborn עַבְדּ֑וֹן <S%H5658><s%> Abdon וְצ֣וּר <S%H6698><s%> then Zur וְקִ֔ישׁ <S%H7027><s%> and Kish וּבַ֥עַל <S%H1168><s%> and Baal וְנֵ֖ר <S%H5369><s%> and Ner וְנָדָֽב׃ <S%H5070><s%> and Nadab
וּגְד֣וֹר <S%H1446><s%> And Gedor וְאַחְי֔וֹ <S%H283><s%> and Ahio וּזְכַרְיָ֖ה <S%H2148><s%> and Zechariah וּמִקְלֽוֹת׃ <S%H4732><s%> and Mikloth

וּמִקְל֖וֹת <S%H4732><s%> And Mikloth הוֹלִ֣יד <S%H3205><s%> begat אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> שִׁמְאָ֑ם <S%H8043><s%> Shimeam וְאַף־ <S%H637><s%> also הֵ֗ם <S%H1992><s%> like נֶ֧גֶד <S%H5048><s%> opposite אֲחֵיהֶ֛ם <S%H251><s%> with their brethren יָשְׁב֥וּ <S%H3427><s%> And they also dwelt בִירֽוּשָׁלִַ֖ם <S%H3389><s%> at Jerusalem עִם־ <S%H5973><s%> with אֲחֵיהֶֽם׃ <S%H251><s%> over against their brethren ס

וְנֵר֙ <S%H5369><s%> And Ner הוֹלִ֣יד <S%H3205><s%> begat אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> קִ֔ישׁ <S%H7027><s%> Kish וְקִ֖ישׁ <S%H7027><s%> and Kish הוֹלִ֣יד <S%H3205><s%> begat אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> שָׁא֑וּל <S%H7586><s%> Saul וְשָׁא֗וּל <S%H7586><s%> and Saul הוֹלִ֤יד <S%H3205><s%> begat אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יְהֽוֹנָתָן֙ <S%H3083><s%> Jonathan וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> מַלְכִּי־ שׁ֔וּעַ <S%H4444><s%> and Malchishua וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אֲבִינָדָ֖ב <S%H41><s%> and Abinadab וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אֶשְׁבָּֽעַל׃ <S%H792><s%> and Eshbaal

וּבֶן־ <S%H1121><s%> And the son יְהוֹנָתָ֖ן <S%H3083><s%> of Jonathan מְרִ֣יב בָּ֑עַל <S%H4807><s%> [was] Meribbaal וּמְרִי־ בַ֖עַל <S%H4810><s%> and Meribbaal הוֹלִ֥יד <S%H3205><s%> begat אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> מִיכָֽה׃ <S%H4318><s%> Micah
וּבְנֵ֖י <S%H1121><s%> And the sons מִיכָ֑ה <S%H4318><s%> of Micah פִּית֥וֹן <S%H6377><s%> [were] Pithon וָמֶ֖לֶךְ <S%H4429><s%> and Melech וְתַחְרֵֽעַ׃ <S%H8475><s%> and Tahrea

וְאָחָז֙ <S%H271><s%> And Ahaz הוֹלִ֣יד <S%H3205><s%> begat אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יַעְרָ֔ה <S%H3294><s%> Jarah וְיַעְרָ֗ה <S%H3294><s%> and Jarah הוֹלִ֛יד <S%H3205><s%> begat אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> עָלֶ֥מֶת <S%H5964><s%> Alemeth וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> עַזְמָ֖וֶת <S%H5820><s%> and Azmaveth וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> זִמְרִ֑י <S%H2174><s%> and Zimri וְזִמְרִ֖י <S%H2174><s%> and Zimri הוֹלִ֥יד <S%H3205><s%> begat אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> מוֹצָֽא׃ <S%H4162><s%> Moza

וּמוֹצָ֖א <S%H4162><s%> And Moza הוֹלִ֣יד <S%H3205><s%> begat אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בִּנְעָ֑א <S%H1150><s%> Binea וּרְפָיָ֥ה <S%H7509><s%> and Rephaiah בְנ֛וֹ <S%H1121><s%> his son אֶלְעָשָׂ֥ה <S%H501><s%> Eleasah בְנ֖וֹ <S%H1121><s%> his son אָצֵ֥ל <S%H682><s%> Azel בְּנֽוֹ׃ <S%H1121><s%> his son

וּלְאָצֵל֮ <S%H682><s%> And Azel שִׁשָּׁ֣ה <S%H8337><s%> had six בָנִים֒ <S%H1121><s%> sons וְאֵ֣לֶּה <S%H428><s%> are these שְׁמוֹתָ֗ם <S%H8034><s%> whose names עַזְרִיקָ֥ם ׀ <S%H5840><s%> [are] these Azrikam בֹּ֙כְרוּ֙ <S%H1074><s%> Bocheru וְיִשְׁמָעֵ֣אל <S%H3458><s%> and Ishmael וּשְׁעַרְיָ֔ה <S%H8187><s%> and Sheariah וְעֹבַדְיָ֖ה <S%H5662><s%> and Obadiah וְחָנָ֑ן <S%H2605><s%> and Hanan אֵ֖לֶּה <S%H428><s%> These בְּנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> these [were] the sons אָצַֽל׃ <S%H682><s%> of Azel פ
